document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the genus Athyreacarus (Acari: Athyreacaridae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the genus Athyreacarus (Acari: Athyreacaridae)

bibRefCitation.author: Khaustov, A. A. & Frolov A. V.
bibRefCitation.refString: Khaustov, A. A. & Frolov A. V. (2017) New species of heterostigmatic mites (Acari: Heterostigmata: Athyreacaridae, Dolichocybidae, Pygmephoridae) associated with scarab beetles (Coleoptera: Geotrupidae, Scarabaeidae) from Brazil. Zootaxa, 4294 (5), 501 - 521. https: // doi. org / 10.11646 / zootaxa. 4294.5.1

subSubSection.paragraph:
Athyreacarus primitivus Khaustov and Frolov, 2017 , p. 302
, Figs 1–6 .

Diagnosis . Setae chb present. Setae
v 2
setiform, sc 1 presented as alveolar pits. Setae c 1 present. No spatulate setae on legs. Three pairs of aggenital setae. Apodemes 5 long. Prodorsal shield without lateral projections; cupules on tergites D and EF well developed.

Material examined . Six females, no locality data, on a beetle
Bolbapium striatopunctatum (Laporte de Castelnau)
( new host );
7 females , PARAGUAY , on a beetle
Bolbapium
sp. ( first record for the country )
; 8 females , no locality data, on a beetle
B. striatopunctatum
;
8 females , BRAZIL , on a beetle
Bolbapium
sp
.;
3 females , BRAZIL [no exact locality], on a beetle
Bolbapium
sp
.;
5 females , BRAZIL , São Paulo , Cerqueira César ,
XI.1996
, J. Carlos leg., on a beetle
Bolbapium sculpturatum (Mannerheim)
( new host )
;

Vale da Solidão

;

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 49 .
Athyreacarus ovalis
sp. nov.
, female: A—dorsum of body, B—venter of body.

subSubSection.paragraph:
All specimens are deposited in the collection of the Tyumen State
University Museum of Zoology , Tyumen , Russia
.

Remarks. This species was described from Brazil ( Khaustov & Frolov 2017 ) from the beetle
Bolbapium howdeni Martínez.
